name: The Weslund Coven
description:
The HEROQUEST Quest Jam 2023 Entry

They say that hags are powerful Dread Sorceresses who steal the souls of the innocent and corrupt all in their path. Always they require three women to form a Coven, though women they are no longer. Lately, there have been rumors out of a small farming community called Weslund. A young girl has gone missing in the night. Two hags intend to transform the stolen girl into their third member, establishing a new Coven. The two hags are Ulsi, a poison brewer, and her sister Astri, a seer. The two of them alone are deadly, but should they succeed in completing the Coven, they would make a terrible force! Travel to the village of Weslund, save the young woman if you are able before the hags twist her into one of their own! Above all, beware the hags' tricks...
